text: Hagi Israeli vahe'mo'za ana mopafina knare hu'za manine'za, nona kiza nemaniza waini hoza ante'za negahaze. Hagi ruga'a kumatmimpima nemaniza vahe'mo'zama Israeli vahe'ma hu havizama hunezmantaza vahetmina knaza nezamisuge'za, zamagra knare hu'za manigahaze. E'ina hanuge'za Israeli vahe'mo'za Nagrikura Ra Anumza mani'ne hu'za ke'za antahi'za hugahaze.
